verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He touched me, Oh, He touched me.
And oh! The joy that floods my soul!
Something happened and now I know.
He touched me and made me whole.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Me ha tocado.
Oh si, me ha tocado.
Y ahora se que es Salvador.
Salva, sana y viene en mi.
Me ha tocado, Cristo el Se√±or.
